name: Pest Control
short_description:
To provide quality full service pest control, termite elimination and wildlife control/removal - using quality products and techniques - at a reasonable price and at a time convenient for our customers. Customer Service: We think you'll be so pleased with Barrier you'll recommend us to your family and friends. Barrier believes that you, our customers, are our best advertisement. We are a locally owned and operated business and you can rest assured our owners are available to discuss the solutions Barrier can offer - you won't be dealing with "corporate".

Let Barrier treat your home for general pest control. We'll give you a set date for each time we're scheduled to come and send you a reminder postcard at least 2 weeks prior to coming. All our technicians and inspectors are friendly, clean and educated (passed the Virginia Registered Technician or Certification exam). They will work with you to solve any pest issues you may have.
